table.name: vtiger_datatransfer
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_datatransfer` ( `datatransferid` int(11) NOT NULL, `subject` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `transfertime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `transferid` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `sourceid` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `targetid` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `transfersql` text, `transferlog` text, `remark` text, `modifiedtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`datatransferid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
